detaileddescription.para:
Create a drop down list objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new drop down list
copy
pointer to a drop down list object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created drop down list

Set the options in a drop down list from a string
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
options
a string with ' ' separated options. E.g. "One\nTwo\nThree"

Set the selected option
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
sel_opt
id of the selected option (0 ... number of option - 1);

Set a fix height for the drop down list If 0 then the opened ddlist will be auto. sized else the set height will be applied.
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list
h
the height when the list is opened (0: auto size)

Set a fix width for the drop down list
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list
w
the width when the list is opened (0: auto size)

Set arrow draw in a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
en
enable/disable a arrow draw. E.g. "true" for draw.

Leave the list opened when a new value is selected
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
en
enable/disable "stay open" feature

Set the scroll bar mode of a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list object
sb_mode
the new mode from 'lv_page_sb_mode_t' enum

Set the open/close animation time.
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list
anim_time
open/close animation time [ms]

Set a style of a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Set the alignment of the labels in a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list object
align
alignment of labels

Get the options of a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
the options separated by ' '-s (E.g. "Option1\nOption2\nOption3")

Get the selected option
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
id of the selected option (0 ... number of option - 1);

Get the current selected option as a string
ddlist
pointer to ddlist object
buf
pointer to an array to store the string
buf_size
size of buf in bytes. 0: to ignore it.

Get the fix height value.
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list object
the height if the ddlist is opened (0: auto size)

Get arrow draw in a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object

Get whether the drop down list stay open after selecting a value or not
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object

Get the scroll bar mode of a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list object
scrollbar mode from 'lv_page_sb_mode_t' enum

Get the open/close animation time.
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list
open/close animation time [ms]

Get a style of a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style

Get the alignment of the labels in a drop down list
ddlist
pointer to a drop down list object
alignment of labels

Open the drop down list with or without animation
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
anim_en
LV_ANIM_ON: use animation; LV_ANOM_OFF: not use animations
Open the drop down list with or without animation
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
anim_en
LV_ANIM_EN: use animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: not use animations

Close (Collapse) the drop down list
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
anim_en
LV_ANIM_ON: use animation; LV_ANOM_OFF: not use animations
Close (Collapse) the drop down list
ddlist
pointer to drop down list object
anim_en
LV_ANIM_ON: use animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: not use animations
